Convert the following sentence from indirect to direct speech, using the reported speech verb "claim" and including the exact time and location of the teacher's statement. 
During a staff meeting at 10 am in the teacher's lounge, the head teacher claimed, "A student has done the homework."

To convert the sentence from indirect to direct speech using the verb "claim" and including the exact time and location, you would write:

During a staff meeting at 10 am in the teacher's lounge, the head teacher claimed, "A student has done the homework."
